name: optiBET
label: optiBET-An Optimized Brain Extraction Tool using FSL BET.
description: optiBET is a shell script to perform brain-extractions even in patients brain, where extensive pathology is present.
author: Analysis Group, FMRIB, Oxford, UK./Montilab at UCLA
cite: Lutkenhoff, E. S., Rosenberg, M., Chiang, J., Zhang, K., Pickard, J. D., Owen, A. M., & Monti, M. M. (2014). Optimized brain extraction for pathological brains (optiBET). PloS one, 9(12), e115551.

Use FSL.description: Script uses FSL for initial extraction default=True.

Use AFNI.description: Script uses AFNI for initial extraction. default=false

MNI152 1mm T1w mask.description: Script uses MNI152_T1_1mm_brain_mask.nii.gz for mask default=True.

Run in debug mode (more files will be ge.description: Use debug mode (will NOT delete intermediate files)

nifti.description: Anatomical NIfTI image, or multi-channel set of images, to be segmented.
